title: Live/Work Studios! Historic Area!
posting_body: Located within walking distance of public transportation, We offers an easy commute to downtown and direct access to all major highways.
You will be just minutes from all the best shopping, restaurants, and entertainment venues in Dallas!
If you are looking for eclectic, up-and-coming apartments in South Dallas in a historic neighborhood, look no further!

Enjoy your brand new apartment home, and take advantage of features like hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, expansive living areas, a sparkling pool, a stunning courtyard, resident center, a fitness center, and more.
Choose from 22 different unique one- and two-bedroom floor plans, in addition to our live-work studios that are also available. .
Located within walking distance of public transportation, We offer an easy commute to downtown and direct access to all major highways.
You will be just minutes from all the best shopping, restaurants, and entertainment venues in Dallas!
Please Call Desiree with DASH Apartment Locators
